  </identifier>

    <entry>72172</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-UL-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:uciteljska/112049</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:uciteljska/112049</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Koliko zlogov?</string>
            <string language="en">How many syllables?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wieviele Silben?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Combien de syllabes ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Quantas sílabas?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Quante sillabe?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πόσες συλλαβές;</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Cuántas sílabas?</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Učenci poimenujejo risbe, nato pa zlogujejo in ob zlogovanju ploskajo. S križci označijo, koliko zlogov ima beseda.</string>
            <string language="en">Set of images that presents one object. For each image the object must be recognized, said out load and then all syllables must be count.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">zlog</string>
            <string language="en">syllable</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">slika</string>
            <string language="en">image</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">štetje</string>
            <string language="en">counting</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Set Bilder, das eine Nachricht darstellt. Für jedes
Bild muß die Nachricht erkannt werden, sagte aus Eingabe und dann 
müssen alle Silben Zählimpuls sein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ensemble d'images qui présente un objet. Pour 
chaque image l'objet doit être identifié, a dit hors du chargement 
et alors toutes les syllabes doivent être compte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Jogo das imagens que apresenta um objeto. Para cada 
imagem o objeto deve ser reconhecido, disse para fora da carga e 
então todas as sílabas devem ser contagem.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Insieme delle immagini che presenta un oggetto. Per 
ogni immagine l'oggetto deve essere riconosciuto, ad esempio verso 
l'esterno il carico ed allora tutte le sillabe devono essere 
conteggio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σύνολο εικόνων που παρουσιάζει ένα αντικείμενο. 
Για κάθε εικόνα το αντικείμενο πρέπει να αναγνωριστεί, εν 
λόγω έξω φορτίο και έπειτα όλες οι συλλαβές πρέπει να είναι 
αρίθμηση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Conjunto de imágenes que presenta un objeto. Para 
cada imagen el objeto se debe reconocer, dijo fuera de carga y 
entonces todas las sílabas deben ser cuenta.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Silbe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bild</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zählen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">syllabe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">image</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">compte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sílaba</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">imagem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">contagem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sillaba</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">immagine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">conteggio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">συλλαβή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εικόνα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">υπολογισμός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">sílaba</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">imagen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">cuenta</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
